00029   virtual Stream::StreamPtr open(const std::string &name)

00044   virtual FileInfoListPtr list(const std::string& dir = "",
00045                             bool recurse=true,
00046                             bool dirs=false) const
00047     {
00048       char **files = PHYSFS_enumerateFiles(dir.c_str());
00049       FileInfoListPtr lst(new FileInfoList);
00050 
00051       // Add all teh files
00052       int i = 0;
00053       while(files[i] != NULL)
00054         {
00055           FileInfo fi;
00056           fi.name = files[i];
00057           fi.isDir = false;
00058 
00059           lst->push_back(fi);
00060         }
00061       return lst;
00062     }
00063
